snippet: Migrant families in detention will have more frequent case reviews to determine if they can be released, Department of Homeland Security officials said.
abstract: Homeland Security Dept says migrant families in detention will be given more frequent case reviews to determine if they can be released under updated policy.
lead_paragraph: Migrant families in detention will have more frequent case reviews to determine if they can be released, Department of Homeland Security officials said.

headline.main: New Review Policy for Migrant Families in Detention
headline.print_headline: New Review Policy for Migrant Families in Detention
